Quote.Author: Henri Bergson
Quote.QuoteValue: To exist is to change, to change is to mature, to mature is to go on creating oneself endlessly

Quote.Author: Henri Bergson
Quote.QuoteValue: Religion is to mysticism what popularization is to science

Quote.Author: Henri Bergson
Quote.QuoteValue: The only cure for vanity is laughter, and the only fault that is laughable is vanity

Quote.Author: Henri Bergson
Quote.QuoteValue: Think like a man of action, act like a man of thought

Quote.Author: Henri Bergson
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing in philosophy which could not be said in everyday language

Quote.Author: Henri Bergson
Quote.QuoteValue: It seems that laughter needs an echo

Quote.Author: Henri Bergson
Quote.QuoteValue: Our laughter is always the laughter of a group

Quote.Author: Henri Bergson
Quote.QuoteValue: Sex appeal is the keynote of our civilization

Quote.Author: Henri Bergson
Quote.QuoteValue: The motive power of democracy is love

Quote.Author: Henri Bergson
Quote.QuoteValue: Wherever anything lives, there is, open somewhere, a register in which time is being inscribed

Quote.Author: Henri Frederic Amiel
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no respect for others without humility in one's self

Quote.Author: Henri Frederic Amiel
Quote.QuoteValue: Destiny has two ways of crushing us - by refusing our wishes and by fulfilling them

Quote.Author: Henri Frederic Amiel
Quote.QuoteValue: Any landscape is a condition of the spirit

Quote.Author: Henri Frederic Amiel
Quote.QuoteValue: True humility is contentment

Quote.Author: Henri Frederic Amiel
Quote.QuoteValue: We are never more discontented with others than when we are discontented with ourselves

Quote.Author: Henri Frederic Amiel
Quote.QuoteValue: Learn to... be what you are, and learn to resign with a good grace all that you are not

Quote.Author: Henri Frederic Amiel
Quote.QuoteValue: The best path through life is the highway

Quote.Author: Henri Frederic Amiel
Quote.QuoteValue: Man becomes man only by his intelligence, but he is man only by his heart

Quote.Author: Henri Frederic Amiel
Quote.QuoteValue: The man who has no inner-life is a slave to his surroundings

Quote.Author: Henri Frederic Amiel
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not interested in age. People who tell me their age are silly. You're as old as you feel

Quote.Author: Henri Matisse
Quote.QuoteValue: There are always flowers for those who want to see them

Quote.Author: Henri Matisse
Quote.QuoteValue: Drawing is like making an expressive gesture with the advantage of permanence

Quote.Author: Henri Matisse
Quote.QuoteValue: Derive happiness in oneself from a good day's work, from illuminating the fog that surrounds us

Quote.Author: Henri Matisse
Quote.QuoteValue: He who loves, flies, runs, and rejoices; he is free and nothing holds him back

Quote.Author: Henri Matisse
Quote.QuoteValue: With color one obtains an energy that seems to stem from witchcraft

Quote.Author: Henri Matisse
Quote.QuoteValue: Creativity takes courage

Quote.Author: Henri Matisse
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not literally paint that table, but the emotion it produces upon me

Quote.Author: Henri Matisse
Quote.QuoteValue: Cutting into color reminds me of the sculptor's direct carving

Quote.Author: Henri Matisse
Quote.QuoteValue: In love, the one who runs away is the winner

Quote.Author: Henri Matisse
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't paint things. I only paint the difference between things

Quote.Author: Henri Nouwen
Quote.QuoteValue: If fear is the great enemy of intimacy, love is its true friend

Quote.Author: Henri Nouwen
Quote.QuoteValue: To learn patience is not to rebel against every hardship

Quote.Author: Henri Nouwen
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest trap in our life is not success, popularity or power, but self-rejection

Quote.Author: Henri Nouwen
Quote.QuoteValue: Peacemaking is a full-time vocation that includes each member of God's people

Quote.Author: Henri Nouwen
Quote.QuoteValue: In their poverty, the mentally handicapped reveal God to us and hold us close to the gospel

Quote.Author: Henri Nouwen
Quote.QuoteValue: Friendship has always belonged to the core of my spiritual journey

Quote.Author: Henri Nouwen
Quote.QuoteValue: Much violence is based on the illusion that life is a property to be defended and not to be shared

Quote.Author: Henri Nouwen
Quote.QuoteValue: Too many of us are lonely ministers practicing a lonely ministry

Quote.Author: Henri Nouwen
Quote.QuoteValue: God wants you to live for others and to live that presence well

Quote.Author: Henri Nouwen
Quote.QuoteValue: A life without a lonely place, that is, without a quiet center, becomes destructive

Quote.Author: Henri Poincare
Quote.QuoteValue: Mathematics is the art of giving the same name to different things

Quote.Author: Henri Poincare
Quote.QuoteValue: To invent is to discern, to choose

Quote.Author: Henri Poincare
Quote.QuoteValue: It is far better to foresee even without certainty than not to foresee at all

Quote.Author: Henri Poincare
Quote.QuoteValue: Hypotheses are what we lack the least

Quote.Author: Henri Poincare
Quote.QuoteValue: It is through science that we prove, but through intuition that we discover

Quote.Author: Henri Poincare
Quote.QuoteValue: Thought is only a flash between two long nights, but this flash is everything

Quote.Author: Henri Poincare
Quote.QuoteValue: Mathematical discoveries, small or great are never born of spontaneous generation

Quote.Author: Henri Poincare
Quote.QuoteValue: Mathematicians do not study objects, but relations between objects

Quote.Author: Henri Poincare
Quote.QuoteValue: Geometry is not true, it is advantageous

Quote.Author: Henri Poincare
Quote.QuoteValue: Mathematicians are born, not made

Quote.Author: Henrik Ibsen
Quote.QuoteValue: A forest bird never wants a cage

Quote.Author: Henrik Ibsen
Quote.QuoteValue: The spectacles of experience; through them you will see clearly a second time

Quote.Author: Henrik Ibsen
Quote.QuoteValue: Home life ceases to be free and beautiful as soon as it is founded on borrowing and debt

Quote.Author: Henrik Ibsen
Quote.QuoteValue: These heroes of finance are like beads on a string; when one slips off, all the rest follow

Quote.Author: Henrik Ibsen
Quote.QuoteValue: The spirit of truth and the spirit of freedom - these are the pillars of society

Quote.Author: Henrik Ibsen
Quote.QuoteValue: The man whom God wills to slay in the struggle of life - he first individualizes

Quote.Author: Henrik Ibsen
Quote.QuoteValue: A minority may be right, and a majority is always wrong

Quote.Author: Henrik Ibsen
Quote.QuoteValue: A community is like a ship; everyone ought to be prepared to take the helm

Quote.Author: Henrik Ibsen
Quote.QuoteValue: The pillars of truth and the pillars of freedom - they are the pillars of society

Quote.Author: Henrik Ibsen
Quote.QuoteValue: A thousand words will not leave so deep an impression as one deed

Quote.Author: Henrikh Mkhitaryan
Quote.QuoteValue: I keep working hard, and this will pay off

Quote.Author: Henrikh Mkhitaryan
Quote.QuoteValue: I will not retreat; I will find the strength to reach my goal

Quote.Author: Henrikh Mkhitaryan
Quote.QuoteValue: As a footballer, you just have to try to learn what you've done bad and what I could do good

Quote.Author: Henrikh Mkhitaryan
Quote.QuoteValue: For Manchest United, every cup is very important. A trophy is a trophy

Quote.Author: Henrikh Mkhitaryan
Quote.QuoteValue: When your dreams are close to coming true, it does not feel real at first

Quote.Author: Henrikh Mkhitaryan
Quote.QuoteValue: I can be very serious, but if I'm being honest, I'm very happy with the way my life has turned out

Quote.Author: Henrikh Mkhitaryan
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot always have good times in your life

Quote.Author: Henrikh Mkhitaryan
Quote.QuoteValue: Manchester United are not just any football club

Quote.Author: Henrikh Mkhitaryan
Quote.QuoteValue: When we're leading during the game, we have to squeeze the opponent

Quote.Author: Henrikh Mkhitaryan
Quote.QuoteValue: I am very proud to join Manchester United. This move is a dream come true for me

Quote.Author: Henry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Friends are born, not made

Quote.Author: Henry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: A teacher affects eternity; he can never tell where his influence stops

Quote.Author: Henry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Chaos was the law of nature; Order was the dream of man

Quote.Author: Henry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: It is always good men who do the most harm in the world

Quote.Author: Henry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Simplicity is the most deceitful mistress that ever betrayed man

Quote.Author: Henry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Chaos often breeds life, when order breeds habit

Quote.Author: Henry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics... have always been the systematic organization of hatreds

Quote.Author: Henry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: He too serves a certain purpose who only stands and cheers

Quote.Author: Henry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: A friend in power is a friend lost

Quote.Author: Henry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: They know enough who know how to learn

Quote.Author: Henry Cavill
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think Americans look bad in spandex

Quote.Author: Henry Cavill
Quote.QuoteValue: I work out two, two and a half hours a day

Quote.Author: Henry Cavill
Quote.QuoteValue: My version of Superman is essentially of a guy who has spent his whole life alone

Quote.Author: Henry Cavill
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother works in a bank, and my dad is the head of my management team and also works in finance

Quote.Author: Henry Cavill
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter what era we're in, we need hope

Quote.Author: Henry Cavill
Quote.QuoteValue: Not every job is a good job

Quote.Author: Henry Cavill
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't see a lot of comic books growing up

Quote.Author: Henry Cavill
Quote.QuoteValue: At boarding school there wasn't much time for much of anything except education

Quote.Author: Henry Cavill
Quote.QuoteValue: The point of acting is to pretend you're someone else and sell a story

Quote.Author: Henry Cavill
Quote.QuoteValue: The hardest part of acting is not being guaranteed work. Every job could be your last

Quote.Author: Henry Fielding
Quote.QuoteValue: Guilt has very quick ears to an accusation

Quote.Author: Henry Fielding
Quote.QuoteValue: All nature wears one universal grin

Quote.Author: Henry Fielding
Quote.QuoteValue: The prudence of the best heads is often defeated by the tenderness of the best hearts

Quote.Author: Henry Fielding
Quote.QuoteValue: Love and scandal are the best sweeteners of tea

Quote.Author: Henry Fielding
Quote.QuoteValue: If you make money your god, it will plague you like the devil

Quote.Author: Henry Fielding
Quote.QuoteValue: A newspaper consists of just the same number of words, whether there be any news in it or not

Quote.Author: Henry Fielding
Quote.QuoteValue: Neither great poverty nor great riches will hear reason

Quote.Author: Henry Fielding
Quote.QuoteValue: Some folks rail against other folks, because other folks have what some folks would be glad of

Quote.Author: Henry Fielding
Quote.QuoteValue: We are as liable to be corrupted by books, as by companions

Quote.Author: Henry Fielding
Quote.QuoteValue: When children are doing nothing, they are doing mischief

Quote.Author: Henry James
Quote.QuoteValue: In museums and palaces we are alternate radicals and conservatives

Quote.Author: Henry James
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes an endless amount of history to make even a little tradition

Quote.Author: Henry James
Quote.QuoteValue: I adore adverbs; they are the only qualifications I really much respect

Quote.Author: Henry James
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been interested in people, but I've never liked them

Quote.Author: Henry James
Quote.QuoteValue: Cats and monkeys; monkeys and cats; all human life is there

Quote.Author: Henry James
Quote.QuoteValue: The only reason for the existence of a novel is that it does attempt to represent life

Quote.Author: Henry James
Quote.QuoteValue: Ideas are, in truth, force

Quote.Author: Henry James
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is a predicament which precedes death

Quote.Author: Henry James
Quote.QuoteValue: In art economy is always beauty

Quote.Author: Henry James
Quote.QuoteValue: Deep experience is never peaceful

Quote.Author: Henry Kissinger
Quote.QuoteValue: There cannot be a crisis next week. My schedule is already full

Quote.Author: Henry Kissinger
Quote.QuoteValue: The task of the leader is to get his people from where they are to where they have not been

Quote.Author: Henry Kissinger
Quote.QuoteValue: Ninety percent of the politicians give the other ten percent a bad reputation

Quote.Author: Henry Kissinger
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever must happen ultimately should happen immediately

Quote.Author: Henry Kissinger
Quote.QuoteValue: A leader does not deserve the name unless he is willing occasionally to stand alone

Quote.Author: Henry Kissinger
Quote.QuoteValue: The conventional army loses if it does not win. The guerrilla wins if he does not lose

Quote.Author: Henry Kissinger
Quote.QuoteValue: Each success only buys an admission ticket to a more difficult problem

Quote.Author: Henry Kissinger
Quote.QuoteValue: The absence of alternatives clears the mind marvelously

Quote.Author: Henry Kissinger
Quote.QuoteValue: No one will ever win the battle of the sexes; there's too much fraternizing with the enemy

Quote.Author: Henry Kissinger
Quote.QuoteValue: The nice thing about being a celebrity is that, if you bore people, they think it's their fault

Quote.Author: Henry Louis Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: Diversity doesn't mean black and white only

Quote.Author: Henry Louis Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: Censorship is to art as lynching is to justice

Quote.Author: Henry Louis Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to have a canon so the next generation can come along and explode it

Quote.Author: Henry Louis Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that the implication of King's assassination has not been fully appreciated

Quote.Author: Henry Louis Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: Brazil is the second blackest nation in the world

Quote.Author: Henry Louis Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: Lincoln had a tremendous capacity for personal growth - more than any other American President

Quote.Author: Henry Louis Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: Suffering does not necessarily ennoble you

Quote.Author: Henry Louis Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be a figure for prison reform. I think that the criminal justice system is rotten

Quote.Author: Henry Louis Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: My father was the funniest man I ever met. He made Redd Foxx look like an undertaker

Quote.Author: Henry Louis Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: The Right insists that anyone can escape poverty by working hard but that is simply not the case

Quote.Author: Henry Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no money, no resources, no hopes. I am the happiest man alive

Quote.Author: Henry Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: All growth is a leap in the dark, a spontaneous unpremeditated act without benefit of experience

Quote.Author: Henry Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: Every moment is a golden one for him who has the vision to recognize it as such

Quote.Author: Henry Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever there be of progress in life comes not through adaptation but through daring

Quote.Author: Henry Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always looked upon decay as being just as wonderful and rich an expression of life as growth

Quote.Author: Henry Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: Man has demonstrated that he is master of everything except his own nature

Quote.Author: Henry Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: The world dies over and over again, but the skeleton always gets up and walks

Quote.Author: Henry Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: If there is to be any peace it will come through being, not having

Quote.Author: Henry Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: Chaos is the score upon which reality is written

Quote.Author: Henry Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: The one thing we can never get enough of is love. And the one thing we never give enough is love

Quote.Author: Henry Paulson
Quote.QuoteValue: In just about every area of society, there's nothing more important than ethics

Quote.Author: Henry Paulson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a straightforward person. I like to be direct with people

Quote.Author: Henry Paulson
Quote.QuoteValue: What I've said repeatedly is, 'I think the auto industry is a very important industry.'

Quote.Author: Henry Paulson
Quote.QuoteValue: China needs a currency that reflects underlying economic fundamentals

Quote.Author: Henry Paulson
Quote.QuoteValue: Too often, we restrict trade that would create U.S. jobs and is in our national interest

Quote.Author: Henry Paulson
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a very real danger that financial regulation will become a wolf in sheep's clothing

Quote.Author: Henry Paulson
Quote.QuoteValue: Regulation needs to catch up with innovation

Quote.Author: Henry Paulson
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the things I enjoy the most is fishing

Quote.Author: Henry Paulson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think all governments engage in intelligence gathering vis-a-vis other governments

Quote.Author: Henry Paulson
Quote.QuoteValue: Illiquid asset purchases are all about capital and encouraging private capital to come in

Quote.Author: Henry Petroski
Quote.QuoteValue: Science is about knowing; engineering is about doing

Quote.Author: Henry Petroski
Quote.QuoteValue: As engineers, we were going to be in a position to change the world - not just study it

Quote.Author: Henry Petroski
Quote.QuoteValue: An over-reliance on past successes is a sure blueprint for future failures

Quote.Author: Henry Petroski
Quote.QuoteValue: Successful engineering is all about understanding how things break or fail

Quote.Author: Henry Petroski
Quote.QuoteValue: Engineering is achieving function while avoiding failure

Quote.Author: Henry Petroski
Quote.QuoteValue: If I could go upstairs and write every day, I would be happy. I don't need recreation

Quote.Author: Henry Petroski
Quote.QuoteValue: Design is nothing if not decision making

Quote.Author: Henry Petroski
Quote.QuoteValue: Many new technologies come with a promise to change the world, but the world refuses to cooperate

Quote.Author: Henry Petroski
Quote.QuoteValue: It is really want, rather than need, that drives the process of technological evolution

Quote.Author: Henry Petroski
Quote.QuoteValue: Read and write with a sensitive ear. The craft of writing is very important. Practice the craft

Quote.Author: Henry Samueli
Quote.QuoteValue: To succeed in hockey, you need teamwork

Quote.Author: Henry Samueli
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't try to try to judge people on performance in one short period of time

Quote.Author: Henry Samueli
Quote.QuoteValue: Long-term career aspirations encompass emotional and intellectual impact of work on society

Quote.Author: Henry Samueli
Quote.QuoteValue: I just took it one step at a time and let fate determine my destiny

Quote.Author: Henry Samueli
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know if anybody thought about how much impact the iPhone could have on society

Quote.Author: Henry Samueli
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't create a mass market if you don't have a common standard

Quote.Author: Henry Samueli
Quote.QuoteValue: Anytime you put a challenge out there, people come up with a creative solution on the software side

Quote.Author: Henry Samueli
Quote.QuoteValue: When we started out, you could design a chip with a few guys in a basement

Quote.Author: Henry Samueli
Quote.QuoteValue: The owner's job is to hire the general manager. The general manager's job is to run the hockey team

Quote.Author: Henry Samueli
Quote.QuoteValue: We covered every major segment of this broadband communications world

Quote.Author: Henry Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: A friend is what the heart needs all the time

Quote.Author: Henry Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: What we do belongs to what we are; and what we are is what becomes of us

Quote.Author: Henry Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: Look around for a place to sow a few seeds

Quote.Author: Henry Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: Genius is talent set on fire by courage

Quote.Author: Henry Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no personal charm so great as the charm of a cheerful temperament

Quote.Author: Henry Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people are so afraid to die that they never begin to live

Quote.Author: Henry Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: A peace that depends on fear is nothing but a suppressed war

Quote.Author: Henry Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is the best thing in the world, and the thing that lives the longest

Quote.Author: Henry Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: Many a treasure besides Ali Baba's is unlocked with a verbal key

Quote.Author: Henry Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: Culture is the habit of being pleased with the best and knowing why

Quote.Author: Henry Ward Beecher
Quote.QuoteValue: Hold yourself responsible for a higher standard than anybody expects of you. Never excuse yourself

Quote.Author: Henry Ward Beecher
Quote.QuoteValue: Every artist dips his brush in his own soul, and paints his own nature into his pictures

Quote.Author: Henry Ward Beecher
Quote.QuoteValue: We never know the love of a parent till we become parents ourselves

Quote.Author: Henry Ward Beecher
Quote.QuoteValue: Flowers are the sweetest things God ever made and forgot to put a soul into

Quote.Author: Henry Ward Beecher
Quote.QuoteValue: It's easier to go down a hill than up it but the view is much better at the top

Quote.Author: Henry Ward Beecher
Quote.QuoteValue: Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul

Quote.Author: Henry Ward Beecher
Quote.QuoteValue: Of all the music that reached farthest into heaven, it is the beating of a loving heart

Quote.Author: Henry Ward Beecher
Quote.QuoteValue: The mother's heart is the child's schoolroom

Quote.Author: Henry Ward Beecher
Quote.QuoteValue: The sun does not shine for a few trees and flowers, but for the wide world's joy

Quote.Author: Henry Ward Beecher
Quote.QuoteValue: A library is not a luxury but one of the necessities of life

Quote.Author: Henry Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: Assumptions are the termites of relationships

Quote.Author: Henry Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: You see, I don't know how to ride a motorcycle, actually

Quote.Author: Henry Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: A human being's first responsibility is to shake hands with himself

Quote.Author: Henry Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: When you love what you do, then you're talking to one of the luckiest guys on the face of the earth

Quote.Author: Henry Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: How we learn has nothing to do with how brilliant we are

Quote.Author: Henry Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: Adam Sandler is truly brilliant. He plays these goofy characters, but he is a brilliant fellow

Quote.Author: Henry Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: If you make compelling television, they will come

Quote.Author: Henry Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: Producing came about because I never wanted to be in one of those books, Where Are They Now?

Quote.Author: Henry Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: In school, I was an underachiever

Quote.Author: Henry Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: Wes Craven is a wonderful friend, and we had a really good time together

Quote.Author: Heraclitus
Quote.QuoteValue: No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it's not the same river and he's not the same man

Quote.Author: Heraclitus
Quote.QuoteValue: The sun is new each day

Quote.Author: Heraclitus
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing permanent except change

Quote.Author: Heraclitus
Quote.QuoteValue: Big results require big ambitions

Quote.Author: Heraclitus
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot step into the same river twice

Quote.Author: Heraclitus
Quote.QuoteValue: Character is destiny

Quote.Author: Heraclitus
Quote.QuoteValue: Our envy always lasts longer than the happiness of those we envy

Quote.Author: Heraclitus
Quote.QuoteValue: Men who wish to know about the world must learn about it in its particular details

Quote.Author: Heraclitus
Quote.QuoteValue: God is day and night, winter and summer, war and peace, surfeit and hunger

Quote.Author: Heraclitus
Quote.QuoteValue: A man's character is his guardian divinity

Quote.Author: Herb Caen
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a memory like an elephant. I remember every elephant I've ever met

Quote.Author: Herb Caen
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing wrong with immortality is that it tends to go on forever

Quote.Author: Herb Caen
Quote.QuoteValue: Cockroaches and socialites are the only things that can stay up all night and eat anything

Quote.Author: Herb Caen
Quote.QuoteValue: The trouble with born-again Christians is that they are an even bigger pain the second time around

Quote.Author: Herb Caen
Quote.QuoteValue: New Yorkers are stuck in a gloomy mucilage of mutual commiseration

Quote.Author: Herb Caen
Quote.QuoteValue: When a place advertises itself as 'World Famous,' you may be sure it isn't

Quote.Author: Herb Caen
Quote.QuoteValue: Logic is no answer to passion

Quote.Author: Herb Caen
Quote.QuoteValue: Philosophically, I don't like doing commercials

Quote.Author: Herb Caen
Quote.QuoteValue: San Franciscans have a bond of self-satisfaction bordering on smugness

Quote.Author: Herb Caen
Quote.QuoteValue: I tend to live in the past because most of my life is there

Quote.Author: Herbert Hoover
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom is the open window through which pours the sunlight of the human spirit and human dignity

Quote.Author: Herbert Hoover
Quote.QuoteValue: Competition is not only the basis of protection to the consumer, but is the incentive to progress

Quote.Author: Herbert Hoover
Quote.QuoteValue: Children are our most valuable natural resource

Quote.Author: Herbert Hoover
Quote.QuoteValue: About the time we can make the ends meet, somebody moves the ends

Quote.Author: Herbert Hoover
Quote.QuoteValue: All men are equal before fish

Quote.Author: Herbert Hoover
Quote.QuoteValue: Wisdom consists not so much in knowing what to do in the ultimate as knowing what to do next

Quote.Author: Herbert Hoover
Quote.QuoteValue: Older men declare war. But it is the youth that must fight and die

Quote.Author: Herbert Hoover
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the only person of distinction who has ever had a depression named for him

Quote.Author: Herbert Hoover
Quote.QuoteValue: When there is a lack of honor in government, the morals of the whole people are poisoned

Quote.Author: Herbert Hoover
Quote.QuoteValue: No public man can be just a little crooked

Quote.Author: Herbert Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: When a man's knowledge is not in order, the more of it he has the greater will be his confusion

Quote.Author: Herbert Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: A jury is composed of twelve men of average ignorance

Quote.Author: Herbert Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: Society exists for the benefit of its members, not the members for the benefit of society

Quote.Author: Herbert Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: How often misused words generate misleading thoughts

Quote.Author: Herbert Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: The great aim of education is not knowledge but action

Quote.Author: Herbert Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: The wise man must remember that while he is a descendant of the past, he is a parent of the future

Quote.Author: Herbert Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: All socialism involves slavery

Quote.Author: Herbert Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: Marriage: A word which should be pronounced 'mirage'

Quote.Author: Herbert Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: Government is essentially immoral

Quote.Author: Herbert Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: We do not commonly see in a tax a diminution of freedom, and yet it clearly is one

Quote.Author: Herbie Hancock
Quote.QuoteValue: I think risk-taking is a great adventure. And life should be full of adventures

Quote.Author: Herbie Hancock
Quote.QuoteValue: Music happens to be an art form that transcends language

Quote.Author: Herbie Hancock
Quote.QuoteValue: You make different colors by combining those colors that already exist

Quote.Author: Herbie Hancock
Quote.QuoteValue: It pulled me like a magnet, jazz did, because it was a way that I could express myself

Quote.Author: Herbie Hancock
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is the tool to express life - and all that makes a difference

Quote.Author: Herbie Hancock
Quote.QuoteValue: Since time is a continuum, the moment is always different, so the music is always different

Quote.Author: Herbie Hancock
Quote.QuoteValue: It's part of life to have obstacles. It's about overcoming obstacles; that's the key to happiness

Quote.Author: Herbie Hancock
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not exclusive, but inclusive, which is the whole spirit of jazz

Quote.Author: Herbie Hancock
Quote.QuoteValue: Creativity shouldn't be following radio; it should be the other way around

Quote.Author: Herbie Hancock
Quote.QuoteValue: Jazz has borrowed from other genres of music and also has lent itself to other genres of music
